alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Crawford; Knox; Morrow; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 12:19PM EDT until July 28 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Richland County in north central Ohio... Ashland County in north central Ohio... Eastern Morrow County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Crawford County in north central Ohio... Northern Knox County in north central Ohio... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1219 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Shelby to Sparta, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Mount Vernon, Mount Gilead, Galion, Shelby, Ontario, Lexington, Crestline, Loudonville, Fredericktown, Bellville, Hayesville, Savannah, Polk, Chesterville, Sparta, Waterford, Sullivan and Butler. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
